entries.description: Improved LLM code review for file review.
@workspace is missing from the welcome to q chat tab
Fix chat syntax highlighting when using several different themes
Amazon Q /doc: progress bar persists after cancelling README creation
Code Review: Fixed a bug where some issues are missing from the code issues view for workspaces with custom names
Amazon Q /doc: Prompt user to choose a folder in chat
Amazon Q /dev not adding Dockerfiles in nested folders
Improved Code Fix generation for code review issues
Fix the quick start buttons on the explore page to show amazon q colours on hover
Q feature dev: recognize .bms, .pli code files
Amazon Q Code Transformation: show job ID in Transformation Hub
UI improvements to Amazon Q Chat: New splash loader animation, initial streaming card animation, improved button colours
Add acknowledgement button for amazon q chat disclaimer
Navigate through prompt history by using the up/down arrows
